K10n2942u_001:1425: yathā: “amī sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāgduścaritena samanvāgatā manoduścaritena samanvāgatā vā āryāṇām apavāda kā mithyādṛṣṭi- samācārāḥ
K10n2942u_001:1426: taddhetos tatpratyayāt kāyasya bhedād apāyavinipāte narakeṣūpapadyate,
K10n2942u_001:1428: (7.3) “amī punar anyasattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāksuca- ritena samanvāgatā manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapa- vādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭisamācārāḥ
K10n2942u_001:1429: te taddhetos tatpratyayāt kāyasya bhedāt sugatau devamanuṣyeṣūtpannāḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1430: “ (7.4) svakarmadharmavipākaṁ yathāvat paśyan sa bhikṣuḥ vitarkayan,
K10n2942u_001:1433: nirvāṇaparyavasāyinyā caryayā carati nirvedikayā kalyāṇayā satatodyuktayā saṁsāraparyavasānayuktayā'nugrahatayā pareṣām,
K10n2942u_001:1436: “ (81) (7.5) sa karmadharmavipākajño bhikṣur narakapretatiryagdeva- manuṣyāṇāṁ karmadharmavipākaṁ tarkayati vigaṇayati |
K10n2942u_001:1437: tadyathā svacchasya prasannasya vaidūryamaṇer antarā sūtrikā,
K10n2942u_001:1438: nīlā vā haridrā vā māñjiṣṭā vā śuklā vā,
K10n2942u_001:1440: evam eva karmamaṇer vipākasūtrikā madhyagatā yā,
K10n2942u_001:1441: tām asau bhikṣuḥ paśyati śrutamayena jñānena divyena vā cakṣuṣā viśuddhena |
K10n2942u_001:1442: (7.6.1) punar api sa bhikṣuḥ śrutamayena jñānena sa paśyati maṇivat karmadharmavipākam:
K10n2942u_001:1443: “tadyathā hi kaścin maṇir bhavati śuklo 'vadātaḥ samantataḥ prasanno nirvraṇaḥ svaccho vedhanakṣamaḥ karmaṇyaḥ samantato dvārabhūtaḥ sarvajanaprāśaṁsyo dhanyo rājārhaḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1444: tam evaṁvidhaguṇayuktaṁ maṇiṁ rājā vā rāja mātro vāsyāṁ guṇābhijñaḥ samūlyābhijño bhūtvā,
K10n2942u_001:1448: samantato avadātaṁ suprasannaṁ nirvraṇaṁ nira- vadyaṁ svaccham;
K10n2942u_001:1450: karma- ṇyaṁ yathā yathā pariṇāmayati dānaśīlajñānāni ca,
K10n2942u_001:1452: vā cakravartirājyāya tad vā devarājyāya tad vā mārarājyāya tad vā brahmarājyāya tad vā nirāsravadhyānasamādhibhāvanārājyāya |
K10n2942u_001:1454: (7.6.3) '“ samantato dvārikā' iti samantadvārāṇi devamanuṣya- dvārabhūtāni |
K10n2942u_001:1455: teṣv asau saddharmamaṇiḥ samantato dvārabhūto bhavati |
K10n2942u_001:1459: (7.6.5) “'rājā rha' iti saddharmapathapratipattijñasya citteśva- rasya yogyaḥ,
K10n2942u_001:1461: iti vaidūryamaṇeś ca sarvaguṇopa- pannasya saddharmamaṇeś caitatsādharmyam upalabhata“ iti |
K10n2942u_001:1462: (7.7.1) punar api sa bhikṣuḥ karmadharmavipākaṁ samanupaśyati maṇivad eva:
K10n2942u_001:1464: na sarvāccho na sarvadvāriko na śuklo na vedhanakṣamo na karmaṇyo na sarvajanaprāśaṁsyo na yogyo rājño vā rājamātrasya vā |
K10n2942u_001:1471: (7.7.6) “'na yogyo rājño vā rājamātrasya vā' iti na saddharma- citteśvarāṇāṁ saddharmapratipannaprapannānām aṣṭānāṁ puruṣa- pudgalānāṁ yogyaḥ
K10n2942u_001:1479: “ (7.8) sa bhikṣur dharmādharmaparīkṣātattvajñaḥ saptamaṁ bhūmy- antaram ārohati |
K10n2942u_001:1481: hṛṣṭā bhaumā yakṣā antarīkṣacarāṇāṁ devānām abhinivedayanti |
K10n2942u_001:1492: (7.9) punar api yogācāra ādhyātmike dharme dharmānupaśyī viha- rati:
K10n2942u_001:1497: tataḥ prabhṛti suptamattapramattānāṁ kuśala eva dharmapravāhaḥ pra- vartayate |
K10n2942u_001:1504: tasmāt tad api rūpaṁ stambhabhūtaṁ sarvakuśalānāṁ dharmāṇām |
K10n2942u_001:1507: “kathaṁ amī sattvā nānārūpā nānāvasthā nānāgatikā nānāvidhāśrayāḥ?
K10n2942u_001:1509: “yasmād ete sattvā nānācittā nānāvidhā- śrayādhimuktā nanavidhakarmaṇaḥ,
K10n2942u_001:1510: tasmād ete sattvā nānārūpā nānāvasthā nānāgatikā nānāvidhāśrayāḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1511: tadyathā dakṣaś citra- karo vā citrakarāntevāsī vā suśukāṁ dṛḍhām ālokyaramyaṁ bhūmin āsādya,
K10n2942u_001:1512: nānāvidhai raṅgair nānāvidhaiś citrair nānāvidhāni śobhanāni rūpāni cittavaśāt kurute |
K10n2942u_001:1514: citrakarmakaraś citrakarmakarāntevāsī vādhimuktikaraḥ suśuklā- yāṁ tridhātubhūmau dṛḍhāyāṁ karmaphalavipākāyāṁ saṁsāra- bhūmau nānāvasthāyāṁ nānāgatikāyāṁ nānāvidhāśrayāyāṁ sattv- āṁś cittacitrakarmakaro'bhinivartayati |
K10n2942u_001:1515: (7.12.2) “punar api yathā śvetena raṅgeṇa śvetarūpaṁ kurute,
K10n2942u_001:1520: tathāyaṁ cittacitrakarmakaraś cittaṁ śvetam ālambanam upādāya śuklān dharmān-akṛ- ṣṭān sāsravai rāgādibhir malaiḥ-śuklaṁ rūpam abhinivarta yati devamanuṣyeṣu |
K10n2942u_001:1524: (7.12.4) “punar api sa cittacitrakarmakaraḥ pītaṁ raṅgam upādāya,
K10n2942u_001:1528: ghnanti ca parasparato rāga- dveṣamohena pītākṛtāḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1529: (7.12.5) “ punar api sa cittacitrakaraḥ kapota kam ālambanaṁ dṛṣṭvā,
K10n2942u_001:1531: te hi vanadāva- dagdhasadṛśatanavaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigatā vividhaduḥkhābhibhūtā bhavanti |
K10n2942u_001:1533: (87) (7.12.6) “ punar api sa cittacitrakarmakaraḥ kṛṣṇaṁ karmabhūtaṁ raṅgam upādāya,
K10n2942u_001:1535: te hi kṛṣṇena karmaṇā tatropapannāḥ kṛṣṇāyasaprākārajvalitanibaddhāḥ kṛṣṇatanavo nānāvidhavyādhikaraṇāḥ kṣutpipāsāśrayabhūtā ana- nyasadṛśena kāraṇāduḥkhenābhibhūtā bhavanti |
K10n2942u_001:1537: “ (7.12.7) punar api sa bhikṣur yogam āsthitaḥ:
K10n2942u_001:1538: “tad eva traidhā- tukaṁ pañcagatikapañcaraṅgaṁ saṁsāracitrapaṭaṁ tribhūmyava- sthaṁ - kāmadhātubhūmikaṁ rūpadhātukam ārūpyadhātukam |
K10n2942u_001:1539: tatra sa cittacitrakarmakaraḥ kāmasevanayā kāmadhātvālambanāni nanavidhāni rūpāṇi ālikhate |
K10n2942u_001:1540: viṁśatividhāni rūpadhātvālambanā- śritāni kāmavisaṁyuktāni caturdhyānakūrcena tadāśritāni ṣoḍaśa- bhūmyavasthitāni rūpadhātāv abhilikhati |
K10n2942u_001:1542: saṁyuktāni samāpatticatuṣkādisamālambanāny ārūpyadhātāv abhi- likhati cittacitrakarmakaraḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1544: (7.13) punar api sa bhikṣuś cittacitrakaraṁ paśyati sattvān ālikha- mānam anyena prakāreṇa:
K10n2942u_001:1554: citrarū- pasadṛśāni rūpāni anekaveṣarūpavastravṛddhijātāny anekakarma- phalavipākakṛtāni |
K10n2942u_001:1555: “ (7.14.1) punar api sa bhikṣur dhyānagatas tam eva cittacitrakaram anyena prakāreṇa sa paśyati:
K10n2942u_001:1558: ujjvalāni kūrca- kāni śobhanāni bhayaparijitāni bhavanti,
K10n2942u_001:1560: evam evāyaṁ cittacitrakaro yady akhinno bhavati,
K10n2942u_001:1564: ākarṣāpakarṣā- khinnaḥ sa cittacitrakarmakaraḥ śobhanāni rūpāṇi dhyānabhūmāv ālikhate |
K10n2942u_001:1566: sa cittacitrakarmakaras tadāśobhanāsu narakapretatiryagbhūmiṣu gatinikāyakāraṇāyomuṣalakūrcenāśubha- raṅgapātrabhūtaṁ nārakeyatiryakpretarūpaṁ tiryaggataṁ vā gṛhyā- śobhanāni rūpāṇy ālikhate ...... vistareṇa pūrvavat ......“ ( 7.15)
K10n2942u_001:1568: punar api sa bhikṣuś cittamarkaṭaṁ markaṭavat paśyati:
K10n2942u_001:1580: “ (90) (7.16) punar api sa bhikṣur dhyānagataś cittanaṭaṁ naṭavat paśyati:
K10n2942u_001:1581: “yathā hi naṭo naṭa nānāveṣaraṅgabhūmivastrasutūrya- dharo bhūtvā,
K10n2942u_001:1583: evam evāyaṁ cittanaṭo nānākarma- nirmitaveṣadhārī vicitrāsu bhūmiṣu gatinikāyabhūmiṣu |
K10n2942u_001:1589: “ (7.17) punar api sa bhikṣur nadīmīnavat paśyati cittamīnam:
K10n2942u_001:1590: “yathā hi mīnaḥ pratatataraṅgākulāyāṁ gambhīraśīghrasroto- durviṣahagatipracārāyām anekavṛksāpakarṣaṇasamarthāyāṁ pra- tataśīghravegānivāryakarmacaṇḍāyāṁ girinadyām unmajjaty ava- majjati,
K10n2942u_001:1591: evam evāyaṁ cittamīnaḥ pratatataraṅgākulāyāṁ tribhava- taraṅgākulāyām,
K10n2942u_001:1598: na- dyāṁ tṛṣṇānadyāṁ cittamīna unmajjananimajjanaṁ kurute |
K10n2942u_001:1601: “ (7.18) punar api sa yogācāra ādhyātmike dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati:
K10n2942u_001:1602: kathaṁ bhikṣur yogam āsthitaḥ karmadharmavipākajñaś cittāyattān sarvasattvān paśyati,
K10n2942u_001:1603: cittaga tikāṁś cittavidheyāṁś cittena vañcamānān paśyati?
K10n2942u_001:1604: sa paśyati śrutamayena jñānena divyena vā cakṣuṣā:
K10n2942u_001:1607: kathaṁ ca ta ime sattvā mucyante saṁsārād anavarāgrād aneka- gatipracārāt?
K10n2942u_001:1608: “ sa paśyati śrutamayena jñānena divyena vā cakṣuṣā:
K10n2942u_001:1611: “ (92) (7.20) tatra cittam anekaprakāram ālambanabhedena svabhāva- bhedena |
K10n2942u_001:1613: yoga- vāhi paramāśrayabhedena - saṁyuktam anuśayasaṁyojanaiś citta- prayuktaiḥ saṁskāraiḥ,
K10n2942u_001:1614: asaṁskṛtair ākāśādibhis tribhir nityair apra- yuktaṁ - pañcaprakāraṁ bhavati |
K10n2942u_001:1617: saṅkṣe- peṇa tad asya sāṅkleśikasya pakṣasya |
K10n2942u_001:1627: pādanakhāt prabhṛti yāvac chirasaḥ sthūlāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni vibhajati: “ko'ham,
K10n2942u_001:1634: na pādatale śarīraṁ yatrāyaṁ ahaṅkāro vartate |
K10n2942u_001:1638: na maṇḍalam ahaṁ vā, śarīraṁ vā |
K10n2942u_001:1639: na śroṇi- kapālam aham, śarīraṁ vā |
K10n2942u_001:1641: na pṛṣṭha- gatāni pañcacatvāriṁśad asthīny ahaṁ vā, śarīraṁ vā |
K10n2942u_001:1642: na grīvā- ṅgāsthīni śarīram, ahaṁ vā |
K10n2942u_001:1643: na mukhagatāny asthīni śarīram, ahaṁ vā |
K10n2942u_001:1653: sa- rṣapamātraṁ cūrṇasadṛśam ātmanaḥ śarīraṁ paśyati |
K10n2942u_001:1674: viraktasya cittasya nandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī na bādhate |
K10n2942u_001:1679: yaduta: yannāma jāyante mriyante'pi cyavante'py upapadyante pañcasu gatiṣu (95)
K10n2942u_001:1680: pañcabhayāpannāḥ!“ tān pratimṛtakopamān mātṛvat kāruṇyam utpadyate:
K10n2942u_001:1681: “kathaṁ evaṁduḥkhitānāṁ sattvānāṁ punaḥ kṣate kṣāra- nibhaṁ krodhaṁ kuryāt prakṛtiduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu?
K10n2942u_001:1682: “ sa dvi tīyaṁ mahākleśaṁ vadhan prativadhan viharati |
K10n2942u_001:1683: (7.21.4) punar api sa bhikṣuḥ kathaṁ tṛtīyamahākleśapratipakṣe pra- yatate?
K10n2942u_001:1688: yadā tu moharahitā bhavanti sam- yagdṛṣṭipuraḥsarāḥ,
K10n2942u_001:1689: tadā kāyasucaritaṁ vāksucaritaṁ manaḥsu- caritaṁ caranti,
K10n2942u_001:1697: yathā vṛkṣasya mūlanāśāt tvaṅmūlapa- trapalāśāskandhaviṭapapuṣpaphalādīnāṁ sarvathaiva mlānāni bha- vanti nāśo vā,
K10n2942u_001:1698: tathaiva teṣāṁ trayāṇāṁ vadhāt sarvakleśavadho bhavati |
K10n2942u_001:1699: “ (8.1) punar api sa yogācāra ādhyātmike dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati:
K10n2942u_001:1700: kathaṁ sa bhikṣuḥ saptamād bhūmyantarād aṣṭamaṁ bhūmyantaraṁ ākrāmati?
K10n2942u_001:1701: sa paśyati śrutamayena jñānena divyena vā cakṣuṣā:
K10n2942u_001:1702: kathaṁ sa bhikṣur ādita eva cakṣur yathābhūtaṁ paśyati?
K10n2942u_001:1703: (8.2) “ kathaṁ vijñeyeṣu sarveṣu rūpeṣu bālapṛthagjanaḥ saṁ- rajyate saṁvirajyate sammuhyate vā?
K10n2942u_001:1705: saṁrajyasthānīyaṁ vā rūpaṁ dṛṣṭvā striyaṁ vā'nyād vā |
K10n2942u_001:1708: rāgadveṣāvṛtacakṣu ṣo rūpaṁ na yathābhūtaṁ paśyati |
K10n2942u_001:1709: 'mohāvṛtacitta' iti bālaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ kalpanāmātrakeṣu cakṣur- vijñeyeṣu saṁrajyate vā virajyate vā saṁmuhyate vā |
K10n2942u_001:1713: sa dantair vā lālāpravisaraklinnapham asthi vivaragataṁ khādayati |
K10n2942u_001:1714: tasyātigṛddhasya śunaḥ svakād āsyād dantavivarād rudhiram āgacchati |
K10n2942u_001:1716: na manyate: 'māmakam evedaṁ rudhiram aham evāsvādayāmi |
K10n2942u_001:1717: ' sa śvā rasagṛddho jihvām api khādayati |
K10n2942u_001:1720: (8.4) “ evam eva bālapṛthagjanaś cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu saṁra- jyate cakṣuramaṇīyāni rūpāṇi |
K10n2942u_001:1721: sa vitarkalālāvṛtamatir vicārā- sthi cakṣuḥsadṛśe āsye prakṣipya,
K10n2942u_001:1722: tathā tathā khādati ye- nāsya tṛṣṇārudhiraṁ syandati |
K10n2942u_001:1729: tasmād asthiśaṅkalopamāni cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāni ca sarva- bālapṛthagjanānāṁ vipralambhakārāṇi |
K10n2942u_001:1733: puruṣair hastyājāneyair adhiṣṭhitaḥ sa mahāvigrahaḥ pañjarāvaruddhaḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1735: tūryagītanāditaiś cāsya vinodanaṁ kriyate yenāsya vanasaukhyaṁ vismaret |
K10n2942u_001:1738: atha sa hastyājāneya evam api paricaryamāṇo vanasaukhyaṁ sveṣṭaṁ viha- ranna eva,
K10n2942u_001:1739: parvatakuñjāni vanapuṣpaphalāni śakunirutāni nadīnir- jhararamyāṇi bhūmibhāgāni anuvicintya,
K10n2942u_001:1746: na cāsya śakyate vinodanaṁ manasaḥ kartum |
K10n2942u_001:1748: na ca prākṛtair hastibhiḥ saha samatām upagantum icchati |
K10n2942u_001:1750: (8.6) “ evaṁ yogācāro bhikṣur anādikālapravṛttaiḥ pañcabhir ba- ndhanair baddhaḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1760: 'prākṛtair hastibhiḥ' samaḥ syād iti prā- kṛtapuruṣaiḥ mithyādṛṣṭihastinām etad adhivacanam |
K10n2942u_001:1761: 'saha saṁvased' iti taiḥ saha satkāyadṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasamprayuktaiḥ prākṛtapuruṣair mukhamadhurābhir mithyādṛṣṭikakathābhiḥ prāmo- dyate
K10n2942u_001:1772: ' bhūmibhāga' iti brāhmāṇāṁ vihārāṇām etad adhivacanam,
K10n2942u_001:1773: yaduta: maitrī karuṇā muditā upe- kṣā |
K10n2942u_001:1778: “ (100) (9.1) punar api yogācāra ādhyātmike dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati:
K10n2942u_001:1779: kathaṁ sa bhikṣur aṣṭamād bhūmyantarān navamaṁ bhūmyantaram ārohati?
K10n2942u_001:1780: sa paśyati śrutamayena jñānena divyena vā cakṣuṣā:
K10n2942u_001:1781: (9.2) “ sarvam idaṁ traidhātukam anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ śūnyānātmā aśucibhāṇḍabhūtam,
K10n2942u_001:1783: “tadyathā vanāntara- vivareṣu mahati parvataśvabhre kharjūrīvṛkṣaḥ syāt,
K10n2942u_001:1785: tasmiṁś ca prānte alpāni phalāni syuḥ,
K10n2942u_001:1793: sa taṁ vṛkṣaṁ ārohayan bālaḥ pṛthagjano mandamedhā alpa- rasāsvādenāpahṛtaḥ |
K10n2942u_001:1797: atha kenacid anyenopāyena prā- kṛtena vā karmaṇā na prapatena,
K10n2942u_001:1798: sākalyena rasarāgena baddho bālabuddhir bahutaram ādīnavaṁ na paśyati |
K10n2942u_001:1802: anekāsamaśatāni pratyeka- kleśaśatasahasrāṇām etatparyeṣaṇāduḥkhānām etad adhivacanam |
K10n2942u_001:1803: 'vṛkṣaprānte sthitāni phalānīti' sarvakāmaviṣaktabuddhīnām iṣṭaśabdasparśarasarūpagandhānām etad adhivacanam |
K10n2942u_001:1805: tadyathā: samudra- praveśena śastrasambhrameṇa rājasevācauryavāṇijyādikleśair cāpyante |
